# JSopX‚Ñ¢ Solution Project (v1)

**Generated by the JSopX‚Ñ¢ SaaS Document Management project, codenamed, `JSopX.BridgeTooFar`.**

---

JSopX‚Ñ¢ Enterprise-Level Solution is a modular SaaS architecture designed to provide comprehensive health management services. It consists of multiple interconnected projects, each serving a specific purpose within the overall system.

## Overview

The **Jason Silvestri Open Project EXperiences (JSopX‚Ñ¢) JSopX‚Ñ¢** Enterprise-Level Solution is a modular SaaS architecture designed to provide comprehensive health management services. It consists of multiple interconnected projects, each serving a specific purpose within the overall system.

---

## Prerequisites

To build and run the **Jason Silvestri Open Project EXperiences (JSopX‚Ñ¢) JSopX‚Ñ¢**, ensure the following are installed:

- [Windows (v 10+)]
- [Visual Studio (v 17.14.21)]
- [.NET Framework (v 9.2.1)]
- [ASP.NET Core (v 9.2.1)]
- [.NET Core Blazor (v 9.2.1)]
- [.Net Core Maui Hybrid (v 9.2.1)]
- [Node (v 20.14.0)]
- [npm (v 10.8.1)]
- [Bootstrap (v 5.3.8)]
- [Angular CLI (v 18.0.3)]
- [React (v 18.2.0)]
- [Vue (v 3.4.21)]
- [Vite (v 5.2.8)]
- [Python (v 3.12.3x+)]
- [Bash (v 5.x+)]
- [Powershell (v 7.x+)]

<!-- 
- [Visual Studio (v 17.14.21)](https://visualstudio.microsoft.com/)  
- [.NET Framework (v 9.0.1)](https://dotnet.microsoft.com/)  
- [ASP.NET Core (v 9.0.1)](https://dotnet.microsoft.com/)  
- [.NET MAUI (v 9.0.1)](https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/maui/)  
- [Node.js (v 20.14.0)](https://nodejs.org/)  
- [npm (v 10.8.1)](https://www.npmjs.com/)  
- [Bash (v 5.x+)](https://www.gnu.org/software/bash/)  
- [PowerShell (v 7.x+)](https://learn.microsoft.com/powershell/)  

-->

## Corequisites

The following Visual Studio project templates are used across the various JSopX‚Ñ¢ projects:

- [Blank Solution VS Template]
- [Website VS Template]
- [ASP.NET Core Web App VS Template]
- [Console App VS Template]
- [Class Library VS Template]
- [Razor Class Library VS Template]
- [Asp.NET Core Web API VS Template]
- [Angular and ASP.NET Core VS Template]
- [React and ASP.NET Core VS Template]
- [Vue and ASP.NET Core VS Template]
- [Blazor Web App VS Template]
- [.NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid and Web App VS Template]
- [.NET MAUI Class Library VS Template]
- [.NET MAUI Multi-Project App VS Template]

**Purpose:** Parent solution providing enterprise-level access to all JSopX‚Ñ¢ projects.  

**Version:** `v 1.0`

**Highlights:**

- Provides enterprise-level access to all available projects in the JSopX‚Ñ¢ system.

## üíæ JSopX.Data

**Purpose:** **_Code First_** EF Core 9 data access layer, DbContext, migrations.  

**Highlights**:

- DbContext per domain, fluent configuration, localdb/SQLite dev support.
- Connection factory for Azure SQL and SQLite fallback.

**Repository Locations**:

* **GitHub:** [`<https://github.com/JasonSilvestri/JSopX.Data>`]
* **Local:**  `E:\\JasonSilvestri\\JSopX.Data`
   
**Continue Documentation**:

* [JSopX.Data] Project

**Visual Studio Template**:

* [Class Library VS Template]

**Common EF commands**:
```bash
# Add a migration
dotnet ef migrations add MigrationName --project ../JSopX.Data

# Update database
dotnet ef database update --project ../JSopX.Data
```

## üîê JSopX.RCLxAssets
**Purpose:** Encrypted secret management (dev filesystem provider + Azure providers).  

**Highlights**:

- `IJSopXSecretRCLxAssets` and versioned secrets.
- Dev: filesystem encrypted blobs; Prod: Azure Blob + AKV key protection.
- Prefer Managed Identity for DB auth.

**Repository Locations**:

* **GitHub:** [`<https://github.com/JasonSilvestri/JSopX.RCLxAssets>`]
* **Local:**  `E:\\JasonSilvestri\\JSopX.RCLxAssets`

**Continue Documentation**:

* [JSopX.RCLxAssets] Project

**Visual Studio Templates**:

* [Blank Solution VS Template]
* [Class Library VS Template]

**Security Notes:**
- Never commit keys; use DPAPI/local key rings in dev, Blob/AKV in prod.
- Version secret naming: `name@yyyyMMddTHHmmss` + `name/current` alias.
  
[`‚áß Back to Top`]

---

## üåê JSopX.WebAPI

**Purpose:** Public API gateway bridging Core, Data, and Presentation.  

**Highlights**:

- ASP.NET Core 9 Minimal APIs / Controllers.
- JWT/OIDC ready, Swagger, health checks, telemetry.
- Secretless DB connections via RCLxAssets.

**Repository Locations**:

* **GitHub:** [`<https://github.com/JasonSilvestri/JSopX.WebAPI>`]

## üß¨ **JSopX.Halos**

**Purpose:**

**Halo\{\} is a Universal AI Design Pattern for Dual-Partner Incremental Redesign**, a 2025 modern **LLM + Quant** backbone pattern for rapid, *reproducible* AI-powered development (_including chat ‚Äúcold-starts‚Äù_). 

> **Halo\{\}** is a technology-agnostic design pattern that fuses a language partner (Partner-L) with quantitative engines (Partner-Q) under strict, machine-checkable contracts, over a predictable product lifecycle.

A `Halo{}` separates **contracts** (JSON schemas; reproducible) from **narratives** (explanations; human-readable). Adapters can change; **contracts and gates do not**.

**Highlights**:

**Halo\{\}** v1 is **ChatGPT-native by design**, authored and proven in collaboration with **Nova and Lumina (ChatGPT AI Assistants)**.  

- **Focus**: ChatGPT cold-starts, envelopes, contracts, gates, provenance‚Äî**battle-tested here first**.  
- **Portability**: `Halos{}` can be adapted to other models via adapters, **deferred intentionally** to protect the origin story and discipline.  
  
**Repository Locations**:

* **GitHub:** [`<https://github.com/JasonSilvestri/JSopX.Halos>`]
* **Local:**  `E:\\JasonSilvestri\\JSopX.Halos`

**Continue Documentation**:

* [JSopX.Halos] Project

**Visual Studio Templates**:

* [Blank Solution VS Template]
* [Class Library VS Template]

[`‚áß Back to Top`]

## üé® JSopX.Presentation
**Purpose:**  Razor Class Library (RCLs) and Maui Class Library (CLs) for shared UI components, styles, assets. 

**Highlights**:

- Shared CSS/JS, Razor, Maui, Resources, Components, `_content/` asset serving.
- **Multiple Projects**: `JSopX.Dev.RCL`, `JSopX.Prod.RCL`, `JSopX.Thor.RCL`, `JSopX.Components.RCL`, `JSopX.Maui.CL` and `JSopX.Maui.RCL`.

**Repository Locations**:

## ü©∫ JSopX.HealthTracker

**Purpose:** Cross-platform .NET MAUI hybrid and Web (v 9.0+) app for health tracking Height, Body Weight, Exercise, Food, Lab Results, Log Entry, Lookup Items, Medication Entry, User Targets, Vitals personalized custom entries and more (Windows, Android, iOS, macOS, and Web).  

**Highlights**:

- **MVP for titration workflows**: offline EF Core 9 DB, BlazorWebView hybrid UI.
- **Caching and Automation**: Local caching, telemetry sync, reminders, titration generator.
- **Future**: pill-bottle camera scanning, voice-to-schedule, OpenAI integrations.
- **Multiple Projects**: `JSopX.HealthTracker.Maui`, `JSopX.HealthTracker.Maui.Shared`, `JSopX.HealthTracker.Maui.Web` and `JSopX.HealthTracker.Maui.Web.Client`.
- **Components**:
- **Models**: `BodyWeightEntry.cs`, `ExerciseEntry.cs`, `FoodEntry.cs`, `LabResult.cs`, `LogEntry.cs`, `LookupItem.cs`, `MedicationEntry.cs`, `UserTargets.cs` & `VitalEntry.cs`.  

**Repository Locations**

* **GitHub Repo:** [`<https://github.com/JasonSilvestri/JSopX.HealthTracker>`]
* **Local Repo:**  `E:\\JasonSilvestri\\JSopX.HealthTracker`
  
**Continue Documentation**:

* [JSopX.HealthTracker] Project

**Visual Studio Templates**:

* [.NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid and Web App VS Template]

<!--
**Suggested immediate tasks**:

## üíñ JSopX.MauiHybridNetCore 
**Purpose:** Cross-platform MAUI hybrid app for medication titration (Windows, Android, iOS, macOS, and Web).  

**Highlights**:

- **MVP for titration workflows**: offline EF Core 9 DB, BlazorWebView hybrid UI.
- **Caching and Automation**: Local caching, telemetry sync, reminders, titration generator.
- **Future**: pill-bottle camera scanning, voice-to-schedule, OpenAI integrations.
- **Multiple Projects**: `JSopX.MauiHybridNetCore.Maui`, `JSopX.MauiHybridNetCore.Maui.Shared`, `JSopX.MauiHybridNetCore.Maui.Web` and `JSopX.MauiHybridNetCore.Maui.Web.Client`.
 
**Repository Locations**

* **GitHub Repo:** [`<https://github.com/JasonSilvestri/JSopX.MauiHybridNetCore>`]
* **Local Repo:**  `E:\\JasonSilvestri\\JSopX.MauiHybridNetCore`

## üíª JSopX.SaaS

**Purpose:** A multi-host **starter portal** that showcases newly manufactured **JSopX‚Ñ¢** **_SaaS_** services, in rapid succession, across our `JSopX.SaaS` SPA (HTML), ASP.NET Core (Razor), and MAUI (Blazor Hybrid and Web) Projects.

**Highlights**:

- **SPA (pure HTML)**‚Äî`JSopX.SaaS.SPA`: for the bare-metal static start,
- **ASP.NET Core**‚Äî`JSopX.SaaS.Core`: for server-hosted Razor,
- **.NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid**‚Äî`JSopX.SaaS.Maui`, `JSopX.SaaS.Maui.Shared`, `JSopX.SaaS.Maui.Web` and `JSopX.SaaS.Maui.Web.Client`: for desktop, web, native mobile, etc.
- **All Projects**‚Äîreusing the same **JSopX.Prod.RCL** assets and components.

**Repository Locations**:

* **GitHub:** [`<https://github.com/JasonSilvestri/JSopX.SaaS>`]
* **Local:**  `E:\\JasonSilvestri\\JSopX.SaaS`

**Continue Documentation**:

* [JSopX.SaaS] Project

**Visual Studio Templates**:

* [Blank Solution VS Template]
* [Asp.NET Core Web App VS Template]
* [.NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid and Web App VS Template]

[`‚áß Back to Top`]

## ‚òÅÔ∏è JSopX.ReactCore
**Purpose:** A first-party ReactCore for Jason Silvestri that starts small (Contacts ‚Üí Orgs ‚Üí Interactions) but is **device-ubiquitous** (MAUI + Web) and leverages our **Presentation** RCL for consistent UI.

**Highlights**:
* **Entities**: Contact, Organization, Interaction (note/log), Tag.
* **Views**:
  * Contact list + detail (notes timeline)
  * Org list + detail (related contacts)
  * Quick add interaction (meeting, call, task)
* **Search/Filter**: by tag, status, org.
* **Offline (Maui)**: local SQLite cache with queued sync to WebApi.
* **Auth**: simple org-internal login (future: OIDC).
- **.NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid**‚Äî`JSopX.ReactCore.Maui`, `JSopX.ReactCore.Maui.Shared`, `JSopX.ReactCore.Maui.Web` and `JSopX.ReactCore.Maui.Web.Client`: for desktop, web, native mobile, etc.

**Repository Locations**:

* **GitHub:** [`<https://github.com/JasonSilvestri/JSopX.ReactCore>`]
* **Local:**  `E:\\JasonSilvestri\\JSopX.ReactCore`

**Continue Documentation**:

* [JSopX.ReactCore] Project

**Visual Studio Templates**:

* [.NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid and Web App VS Template]

[`‚áß Back to Top`]

---

## üîÑ JSopX.VueCore
**Purpose:** A first-party VueCore (Product Lifecycle Management) system for Jason Silvestri that starts small (Products ‚Üí Lifecycles ‚Üí Lifecycle Phases ‚Üí Workflows ‚Üí Decision Gates) but is **device-ubiquitous** (MAUI + Web) and leverages our **Presentation** RCL for consistent UI.

**Highlights**:

* **Entities**: Products/Models, Lifecycles, Phases, Workflows, Decision Gates, and governed by Workflow States.
* **Search/Filter**: by tag, status, org.
* **Flow (Charts)**: Be able to visualize workflows and decision gates, using the same data Entities.
* **Auth**: simple org-internal login (future: OIDC).
- **.NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid**‚Äî`JSopX.VueCore.Maui`, `JSopX.VueCore.Maui.Shared`, `JSopX.VueCore.Maui.Web` and `JSopX.VueCore.Maui.Web.Client`: for desktop, web, native mobile, etc.

**Repository Locations**:

* **GitHub:** [`<https://github.com/JasonSilvestri/JSopX.VueCore>`]
* **Local:**  `E:\\JasonSilvestri\\JSopX.VueCore`

**Continue Documentation**:

* [JSopX.VueCore] Project

**Visual Studio Templates**:

* [.NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid and Web App VS Template]
